subject: Axon API Changes
body:
Good afternoon,
 
Our Evidence Team is asking if any of the following changes to the Axon API / Evidence export feature could be added:
*	Forcing the User field to be non-selectable and using the current user signed in
*	Force the Title field to be a static value of �Flock Upload�
*	Make the Case Number field mandatory, and require a format of XX-XXXXX
*	Make the ID field mandatory, and require a format of XX-XXXXXX
*	Add a field for Category that syncs with the category options in Evidence.com
 
 
Thank you.
 
Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department
300 Country Club Road
Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806
